io.spring.initializr.generator.spring.build.gradle

Class GradleProjectGenerationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spring.initializr.generator.spring.build.gradle.GradleProjectGenerationConfiguration

  • @ProjectGenerationConfiguration
 @ConditionalOnBuildSystem(value="gradle")
public class GradleProjectGenerationConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration for contributions specific to the generation of a project that will use Gradle as its build system.
    Author:
    Andy Wilkinson, Jean-Baptiste Nizet
